foreignData.name: Argothische Zauberin
foreignData.text: Die Argothische Zauberin kann nicht viel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein. Immer wenn Du erfolgreich eine Verzauberung sprichst, ziehe eine Karte.

mainBoard.name: Argothian Enchantress
mainBoard.originalText:
Argothian Enchantress cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
Whenever you successfully cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

rulings.text: Argothian Enchantress’s last ability will resolve before the spell that caused it to trigger.
Enchantments put onto the battlefield without being cast won’t cause Argothian Enchantress’s last ability to trigger.
If the enchantment spell is countered, Argothian Enchantress’s last ability still resolves and causes you to draw a card.

mainBoard.text:

"Ach! Hans, run! It's the lhurgoyf!"

foreignData.name: Lhurgoyf
foreignData.text: Der Lhurgoyf hat eine Stärke gleich der Anzahl der Kreaturenkarten auf allen Friedhöfen und eine Widerstandskraft gleich 1 plus der Anzahl der Kreaturenkarten auf allen Friedhöfen.

mainBoard.name: Lhurgoyf
mainBoard.originalText: Lhurgoyf has power equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and toughness equal to 1 plus the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
mainBoard.text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

mainBoard.flavorText: Ages ago, a party of elves took cover to let one pass. They're still waiting.

foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Opfere während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Verzauberung oder opfere den Endlosen Wurm.

mainBoard.name: Endless Wurm
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample
During your upkeep, sacrifice an enchantment or sacrifice Endless Wurm.

rulings.text: You choose whether to sacrifice an enchantment or not on resolution. If not, then you sacrifice this card. You can choose to not sacrifice an enchantment if you no longer control this card on resolution.

mainBoard.text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Endless Wurm unless you sacrifice an enchantment.

mainBoard.name: Clear
mainBoard.originalText:
Destroy target enchantment.
Cycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

rulings.text: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

mainBoard.text:
Destroy target enchantment.

foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung Deiner Wahl.

mainBoard.name: Disenchant
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"It is not your place to rule, Radiant. It may not even be mine."
—Serra

foreignData.name: Bescheidenheit
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl verliert alle ihre Fähigkeiten und wird zu einer 0/1 Kreatur bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Humble
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature loses all abilities and is a 0/1 creature until end of turn.

rulings.text: Effects that modify a creature’s power and/or toughness, such as the effect of Seal of Strength, will apply to the creature no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for any counters that change its power and/or toughness and effects that switch its power and toughness.

Humble doesn’t counter abilities that have already triggered or been activated. In particular, casting this spell won’t stop a creature’s ability that says “At the beginning of your upkeep,” “When this creature enters the battlefield,” or similar from triggering.

Humble overwrites all previous effects that set the creature’s base power and toughness to specific values. Any power- or toughness-setting effects that start to apply after Humble resolves will overwrite this effect.
If the affected creature gains an ability after Humble resolves, it will keep that ability.

mainBoard.text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.

mainBoard.flavorText: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

foreignData.name: Brandrodung
foreignData.text: Opfere ein Land. Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach bis zu zwei Standardlandkarten und bringe diese ins Spiel. Mische Deine Bibliothek danach neu.

mainBoard.name: Harrow
mainBoard.originalText: Sacrifice a land: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.

rulings.text: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
The sacrifice of a land is part of the cost of casting Harrow. You can't pay this cost more than once to get a multiple effect.
The two lands do not count toward your normal one land you can play each turn.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

foreignData.name: Verborgene Guerrillas
foreignData.text: Wenn einer Deiner Gegner erfolgreich einen Artefaktzauber spricht und die Verborgenen Guerrillas eine Verzauberung sind, werden die Verborgenen Guerrillas zu einer 5/3 Kreatur, die als Soldat zählt und Trampelschaden verursacht.

mainBoard.name: Hidden Guerrillas
mainBoard.originalText: When one of your opponents successfully casts an artifact spell, if Hidden Guerrillas is an enchantment, Hidden Guerrillas becomes a 5/3 creature with trample and that counts as a Soldier.

rulings.text: It changes into a creature even if the spell is countered.
When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

mainBoard.text: When an opponent casts an artifact spell, if Hidden Guerrillas is an enchantment, Hidden Guerrillas becomes a 5/3 Soldier creature with trample.

foreignData.name: Verborgene Herde
foreignData.text: Wenn einer Deiner Gegner ein Nicht-Standardland ausspielt und die Verborgene Herde eine Verzauberung ist, wird die Verborgene Herde zu einer 3/3 Kreatur, die als Bestie zählt.

mainBoard.name: Hidden Herd
mainBoard.originalText: When one of your opponents plays a nonbasic land, if Hidden Herd is an enchantment, Hidden Herd becomes a 3/3 creature that counts as a Beast.

rulings.text: Does not trigger on lands put onto the battlefield by a spell or ability.
When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

mainBoard.text: When an opponent plays a nonbasic land, if Hidden Herd is an enchantment, Hidden Herd becomes a 3/3 Beast creature.

foreignData.name: Verborgene Jäger
foreignData.text: Wenn einer Deiner Gegner eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder größer kontrolliert und die Verborgenen Jäger eine Verzauberung sind, werden die Verborgenen Jäger zu einer 4/4 Kreatur, die als Bestie zählt.

mainBoard.name: Hidden Predators
mainBoard.originalText: When one of your opponents controls a creature with power 4 or greater, if Hidden Predators is an enchantment, Hidden Predators becomes a 4/4 creature that counts as a Beast.

rulings.text: When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

mainBoard.text: When an opponent controls a creature with power 4 or greater, if Hidden Predators is an enchantment, Hidden Predators becomes a 4/4 Beast creature.

foreignData.name: Leuchtender Schein
foreignData.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +1/+2. Wenn der Leuchtende Schein aus dem Spiel auf dem Friedhof landet, bringe den Leuchtenden Schein zurück auf die Hand seines Besitzers.

mainBoard.name: Brilliant Halo
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
When Brilliant Halo is put into a graveyard from play, return Brilliant Halo to owner's hand.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
When Brilliant Halo is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Brilliant Halo to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.name: Hidden Ancients
mainBoard.originalText: When one of your opponents successfully casts an enchantment spell, if Hidden Ancients is an enchantment, Hidden Ancients becomes a 5/5 creature that counts as a Treefolk.

rulings.text: It changes into a creature even if the spell is countered.
When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

mainBoard.text: When an opponent casts an enchantment spell, if Hidden Ancients is an enchantment, Hidden Ancients becomes a 5/5 Treefolk creature.

foreignData.text:

Wenn Du ein Land ausspielst und der Verborgene Hirsch eine Kreatur ist, wird der Verborgene Hirsch zu einer Verzauberung.

mainBoard.name: Hidden Stag
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever one of your opponents plays a land, if Hidden Stag is an enchantment, Hidden Stag becomes a 3/2 creature that counts as a Beast.
Whenever you play a land, if Hidden Stag is a creature, Hidden Stag becomes an enchantment.

rulings.text: Does not trigger on lands put onto the battlefield by a spell or ability.
When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

mainBoard.text:

Whenever you play a land, if Hidden Stag is a creature, Hidden Stag becomes an enchantment.

foreignData.name: Eid der Lehensleute
foreignData.text: Wenn während der Versorgungsphase eines Spielers dieser Spieler weniger Länder als ein Gegner seiner Wahl kontrolliert, kann der Spieler seine Bibliothek nach einer Standardlandkarte durchsuchen und diese direkt ins Spiel bringen. Dieser Spieler mischt danach seine Bibliothek neu.

mainBoard.name: Oath of Lieges
mainBoard.originalText: During each player's upkeep, if that player controls fewer lands than target opponent, the player may search his or her library for a basic land card and put that land into play. The player shuffles his or her library afterwards.

rulings.text: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
The land card enters under the current player's control.
Shuffling the library is part of the optional effect. The player only shuffles if they chose to search.
The ability can only target an opponent of the current player.

The targeted player controlling more lands than the current player is a part of the targeting requirement. A player can't be targeted by this ability unless it's true, and the ability doesn't resolve if it's no longer true at that time.

mainBoard.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more lands than they do and is their opponent. The first player may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainBoard.flavorText: "It is *not* sad," Radiant chided the lesser angel. "It is right. Every society must have its outcasts."

foreignData.name: Pariah
foreignData.text: Leite alle Schadenspunkte, die Dir zugefügt werden, auf die verzauberte Kreatur um.

mainBoard.name: Pariah
mainBoard.originalText: Redirect to enchanted creature all damage dealt to you.

rulings.text: If you control multiple Pariahs enchanting different creatures, you choose which redirection effect to apply. You can't divide damage dealt by one source or combat damage dealt by multiple creatures simultaneously. For example, if a spell would deal 6 damage to you and you control multiple Pariahs, you may have that 6 damage dealt to either of the enchanted creatures instead, but you can't choose to have 3 damage dealt to each one.
If you would be dealt combat damage, the damage dealt to the enchanted creature instead is still combat damage.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Believe in the ideal, not the idol."
—Serra

foreignData.name: Anbetung
foreignData.text: Jeglicher Schaden, der eigentlich Deine Lebenspunkte unter 1 reduzieren würde, reduziert sie stattdessen auf 1, falls Du eine Kreatur kontrollierst.

mainBoard.name: Worship
mainBoard.originalText: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 instead reduces it to 1 if you control a creature.

rulings.text: It reduces your life total to 1, not the damage to 1.

Worship does not prevent damage. It causes some damage to be unable to lower your life total. So any damage rendered useless by Worship was still dealt and is counted by effects that track the amount of damage done to a player. In addition, Worship does not prevent loss of life, so loss of life bypasses Worship.

mainBoard.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

sideBoard.originalText:
Play Spreading Algae only on a swamp.
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy that land.
When Spreading Algae is put into a graveyard from play, return Spreading Algae to owner's hand.

rulings.text: This card now has Enchant Swamp, which works exactly like any other Enchant ability. This means it can only be cast targeting a Swamp, and it will be put into its owner’s graveyard if the permanent it’s attached to ever stops being a Swamp.

sideBoard.name: Rune of Protection: Black
sideBoard.originalText:
oo
W Prevent all damage to you from a black source. (Treat further damage from that source normally.)
Cycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

rulings.text: A source of damage is a permanent, a spell on the stack (including one that creates a permanent), or any object referred to by an object on the stack. A source doesn't need to be capable of dealing damage to be a legal choice.
Can be used even when there is no damage to prevent. It prevents the next damage (if any) from the source this turn.

sideBoard.text:
{W}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

Schutz vor Blau

sideBoard.name: Scragnoth
sideBoard.originalText:
Protection from blue
While Scragnoth is being cast, it cannot be countered.

rulings.text: Side-effects of spells that would counter this card will still happen, because they happen even if the spell they’re trying to counter can’t be countered.
Spells can target Scragnoth and affect it while it is on the stack. Only effects that counter spells are ignored.
Spells with a side effect that only happens if a spell is countered do not have their side effect happen when the countering fails.

sideBoard.text:
This spell can't be countered.
